pageTitle: Mobile Product Strategy | Ryan Andrew Pretzer
metaDescription: Strategic mobile product ownership and roadmap development for enterprise-scale implementations. Transform your mobile capability with proven Fortune 500 experience.

hero.title: Mobile Product Strategy
hero.subtitle: Transform your mobile capability with strategic product ownership, roadmap development, and enterprise-scale implementation expertise.

sections.title: The Mobile Strategy Challenge
sections.content: Enterprise mobile development often struggles with fragmented strategy, competing priorities, and the complexity of coordinating multiple teams toward shared goals.

sections.title: Strategic Mobile Product Ownership
sections.intro: I help enterprise organizations build unified mobile product strategies that align development teams, business stakeholders, and user needs into cohesive roadmaps that drive measurable outcomes.
items: Cross-platform product strategy and roadmap development
Feature backlog management with business value prioritization
Team coordination across multiple development groups
User research integration and feedback loop optimization
Success metrics definition and tracking systems

sections.title: Case Study: USAA Mobile Platform
sections.description: USAA needed to coordinate mobile development across 50+ teams while maintaining consistency and accelerating feature delivery for their financial services platform.
sections.approach: Led product management for enterprise mobile design system and coordinated cross-team roadmap through PI planning process, establishing shared components and development patterns.
sections.results: Enabled unified mobile experience across multiple business units while reducing development time and improving code quality through strategic product ownership.

items.title: Product Strategy
items.description: Cross-platform roadmap development, feature prioritization frameworks, business value alignment, user research integration, competitive analysis

items.title: Team Coordination
items.description: Agile/SAFe methodology implementation, PI planning facilitation, cross-team dependency management, stakeholder communication, backlog management

items.title: Enterprise Context
items.description: Fortune 500 experience, regulatory compliance understanding, legacy system integration, security and governance, change management
